Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Rescue and Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz's near-drowning experience, his rescue by Alley Oop, and the subsequent humorous confrontation over an unpaid debt, all occurring at the water's edge.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Peril and Alley's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is drowning and Alley Oop is called to rescue him by his companion.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Peril and Alley's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: The Aftermath and the Unpaid Debt
sub_scenes.description: Following the rescue, Alley Oop confronts King Guz about an old debt, creating a humorous and awkward situation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Aftermath and the Unpaid Debt

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Clumsiness and the Dinosaur Market
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the issue of dinosaur clumsiness, leading to the idea of trading in an old dinosaur for a newer model, and follows the characters through a dinosaur dealership and a test drive.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Clumsiness Explained
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's dinosaur keeps bumping into trees, and the reason for this clumsiness is explained as old age.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness and Repeated Tree Collisions
The Explanation for Dinosaur's Clumsiness: Old Age

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Shopping and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: The narrative follows the characters as they consider trading in their old dinosaur, visit a dealership, consider a new model, and take it for a test drive, culminating in a purchase despite a biting incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Exhilaration and Unexpected Bite

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Departure and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the emotional farewell to Dinny, the old dinosaur, his departure from his owner, and his arrival at the discounted dinosaur lot.

narrative_arcs.title: Regret and Justification for Trading Dinny
Dinny at the Discounted Dinosaur Lot

sub_scenes.title: New Dinosaur Shopping and Dinny's Roar
sub_scenes.description: The narrative returns to dinosaur shopping, featuring price negotiation and another test ride, unexpectedly interrupted by the sound of Dinny's roar.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Defense and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Dinny's mistreatment at the dinosaur lot, his defense against an attacker, and his subsequent rescue and escape, leading to chaos and fear among the cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Rescue and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated and threatened, but defended by a caveman who shows him loyalty, leading to Dinny's escape and causing panic.

narrative_arcs.title: Intervention and Retaliation Against Dinny's Attacker
Dinny's Charge and the Cavemen's Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rejection and Fishing Philosophy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Alley Oop's romantic endeavors with Coola, leading to rejection and a humorous, painful consequence, followed by a shift to general fishing-related complaints and misogynistic views.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Coola fishing, but she rejects him, leading to sarcasm and an unexpected physical mishap.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley Oop's Fishing Invitation and Coola's Rejection

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Complaints and Misogynistic Philosophy
sub_scenes.description: The narrative shifts to general complaints about women and noise during fishing trips, culminating in a humorous exchange among fishermen.

narrative_arcs.title: Complaint about Screaming and Noise While Fishing
Accusation of Noise and 'Worse Than a Woman' Insult

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is drawn into a romantic rivalry concerning Oola, leading to an awkward encounter and a violent misunderstanding.

narrative_arcs.title: Friendly Greeting and Inquiry about Mood
Accusation of Laziness and Romantic Competition
Insistence on Truth and Challenge to Witness Oola's Affection
Mistaken Concern and Revelation of Affection
Realization of Rejection and Condescending Dismissal

sub_scenes.title: Romance Explained and Failed Gesture
sub_scenes.description: The concept of romance is explained to an angry caveman, followed by Leggo's disastrous attempt to use romance to impress Oola, resulting in an alligator attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Angry Threat and Introduction of Romance
Explanation of Romance as Tenderness and Gentleness
Advice to Observe Technique and Humorous Realization
Escape from the Alligator and Oola's Disappointment

sub_scenes.title: Leggo's Jealousy and Relationship Troubles
sub_scenes.description: Leggo's jealousy and misinterpretations continue, leading to accusations, confessions, and philosophical fishing conversations about women.

Major_Arcs.title: The Perils of the New Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the new dance craze, 'The Twitch,' its dangerous physical effects, and Alley Oop's disastrous attempt to learn and perform it.

sub_scenes.title: The New Dance Craze and its Consequences
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance is revealed to be causing injuries, leading to social pressure to learn it and Alley Oop's attempt at dance lessons.

narrative_arcs.title: The Perils of the New Twist
Oola's Ultimatum and the Twitch Party
The Disastrous Dance Lesson
narrative_arcs.description: A caveman attempts to learn 'the twitch' with a clumsy and painful dance lesson.

narrative_arcs.title: The Disastrous Dance Performance
narrative_arcs.description: Alley Oop's performance of 'the twitch' at a party leads to chaos, a chase, and mass injuries, highlighting the disastrous consequences of the dance.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain for Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a time travel plotline where scientists plan to send Alley Oop to 16th-century Spain for research, leading to an interrupted romantic moment and a series of humorous misunderstandings in Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Plot Setup
sub_scenes.description: Scientists devise a plan to use a time machine and Alley Oop to gather information about 16th-century Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: The Spain Research and Time Machine Idea
Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley Oop and Oola

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Kiss and Time Travel Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop and Oola's romantic moment is interrupted by the time machine, which malfunctions and transports them to the 20th century lab.

narrative_arcs.title: Eleven Years Engaged - The Kiss Request
Reluctant Agreement to a 'Little Old Kiss'
Time Machine Tuned to Oop's Century
Puckered Up and Time Travel Kiss
Time Machine Mishap - Transported to the Lab

sub_scenes.title: Explanation and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Dr. Wonmug explains the Spain assignment and the reason for bringing Alley Oop to the future, despite Oola's displeasure at the interrupted kiss.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
A Kiss Awaits and Return to Spain

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Serenade Incident
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop arrives in Spain and immediately gets involved in a misunderstanding related to a noisy serenade.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Noisy Serenade

sub_scenes.title: Escalation of the Serenade Incident
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's intervention in the serenade backfires, leading to a confrontation with the serenader and his manager, revealing the serenader's importance.

Major_Arcs.title: The Unconventional Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts an unconventional bullfight where a muscular man replaces an injured matador and uses brute force instead of traditional bullfighting techniques.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Setup
sub_scenes.description: A bullfight is delayed due to an injured matador, leading to a muscular man volunteering to fight the bull.

sub_scenes.title: The Bullfight
sub_scenes.description: The unconventional bullfight commences with the muscular man using an axe to defeat the bull, to the crowd's amusement and approval.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley's Return and Denied Kiss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Alley's return from his assignment, his anticipation of a promised kiss, and the humorous denial of the kiss due to a misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Return and Denied Kiss
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop returns and anticipates a promised kiss, but it is denied due to a misunderstanding and suspicion.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of 'King for a Day,' where the initial allure of kingship quickly turns into a burden, leading to a reluctant temporary king.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: The concept of 'King for a Day' is introduced, and the initial king quickly tries to escape the responsibilities by appointing a temporary replacement.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day - Initial Setup
Halt and Desist - King's Authority Challenged
Easy Job? - The Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: The Temporary King's Reign
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king faces immediate rejection, but quickly adapts and decides to enjoy the perks of kingship despite the initial mistreatment.

narrative_arcs.title: Acceptance and Exploitation of Kingship Perks

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic Disputes of Guz
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously portrays the domestic disputes between Guz and his wife, focusing on trivial matters like eating ulcer pills and dirtying the floor.

sub_scenes.title: Domestic Disputes of Guz
sub_scenes.description: Guz faces his wife's wrath over eating ulcer pills and getting the floor dirty, highlighting their typical domestic conflicts.

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Disputes and King's Ulcer
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various disputes within the caveman society, including cheating and money fights, and focuses on the king's ulcer problems and erratic behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Disputes and Royal Wisdom
sub_scenes.description: Several disputes arise among cavemen, including cheating at games and money fights, resolved by royal wisdom in a clam dispute case.

narrative_arcs.title: The Clam Dispute and Royal Wisdom

sub_scenes.title: Palace Events and King's Ulcer
sub_scenes.description: Events within the palace include a palace beating, scolding of an advisor, and the king's sudden ulcer outburst during dinner.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Diet and Violence
sub_scenes.description: The king's ulcer diet is introduced, leading to job regret and an unexpected violent outburst from the server.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath of Violence and New Kingship
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the server's violence leads to apology and reconciliation, the king's relief at being a citizen again, and a new kingship offer.

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act of Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the ironic 'Barberous Act,' revealing a 'Grand Wizer' to be a barber who forcibly shaves cavemen, contrasting with romantic expectations.

sub_scenes.title: The Barberous Act
sub_scenes.description: The 'Barberous Act' is revealed to be forced shaving, initiated by a 'Grand Wizer' who is actually a barber.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment Gone Wrong
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a scientist's time travel experiment that goes awry, bringing a Roman soldier to the present instead of the intended subject, leading to the realization of a time machine malfunction.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Experiment Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: A scientist's time travel experiment results in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier, revealing a malfunction in his time machine.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting Up the Time Travel Experiment
